o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_ChildAttributeEdit
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript: ' If the joined object is set, show an object picker for the entity and store the selected one. Sub %Method%(obj) If Not(obj.Parent.Parent.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_JoinedObject") Is Nothing) Then Dim objChildEntity : Set objChildEntity = obj.Parent.Parent.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_JoinedObject") Dim objChildAttribute : Set objChildAttribute = SelectInputAttribute(objChildEntity) If Not(objChildAttribute Is Nothing) Then obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_ChildAttribute", objChildAttribute End If End If End Sub
